data.title: Dr. Giuseppe Maida (MD), Curriculum Vitae
data.text:
High school Diploma obtained from "V.Lanza" in Foggia (IT)

Degree in Medicine and Surgery from the University of Bologna (IT) on May 22nd, and Medical Surgery internship at the University of Bologna (IT), second cycle 1993

Specialization in Neurosurgery at the University of Ferrara (IT) on October 25th, 1999

Member of the “Ordine dei Medici della Provincia di Ferrara” (IT) since February 11th, 2000

Member of the Italian Society of Neurosurgery and the Study Group for vertebra-medullary surgery since 2001

Member of the Italian Society of Spinal Surgery ("G.I.S.")

Since 2010, a member of the "Associazione Artroplastica Vertebrale Italiana (AAVI)", founded in 2010, for the study and development of the intervertebral disc prosthesis, the “no-fusion”, and spinal motion preservation.

2010-2021 the "SIAD" contact person for the "Spine Learning Center" program, responsible for the training of spine surgeons in the treatment of degenerative pathologies of the cervical and lumbosacral spine

Since 2021 "Nuvasive" and "Clover Orthopedics" contact person for the "Spine Learning Center " program,responsible for training of spine surgeon in the treatment of degenerative pathologies of lumbosacral spine

Member of the International Society of Minimally Invasive Neurosurgery (I.S.M.I.N.S.)

Member of fhe international society"AO-SPINE"

Reviewer for Journal of Medical Science,Journal Medical Device:Evidnce and Research,Journal Therapeutics and Clinical Risk Management,International Journal of Clinical Research and Trails,American Journal of Case Reports, Current Medical Imaging Review

Editorial Board Member : " Research and Reviews:Orthopedics", "Annals of Neurological Surgery"

Head of Spine Surgery Division,Dpt of Surgery,S.Maria Maddalena Hospital,Occhiobello (RO, IT), part of training network of Postgraduate School in Neurosurgery,Modena and Reggio Emilia University (UNIMORE-Italy)

Professor Postgraduate School of Neurosurgery, Modena and Reggio Emilia University (UNIMORE-Italy)

Academic title of "Cultore della Materia,Neurosurgery",University of Ferrara(IT) ,School of Medicine

Professor in Advanced Algology Research Master

Già head for "Minimally Invasive Surgery of the Spine and Spinal Stabilization Devices",University Hospital "Arcispedale S.Anna",Department of Neurosciences and Rehabilitation,Neurosurgical Division in Cona-Ferrara(IT),until 19.11.2012

Già School of Medicine Professor at the University of Ferrara (IT), già Neurosurgery Postgraduate School Professor ( “Tutor”- 4th year; Vertebra-Medullary Trauma-3 th year) of the same University,già Orthopedic Postgraduate School Professor (Malattie dell'Apparato Locomotore, 3 th year) University of Ferrara (IT)
